Package controller

Class UpdateCustomerViewController

java.lang.Object
controller.UpdateCustomerViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class UpdateCustomerViewController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The UpdateCustomerViewController class is responsible for managing the updating of customer information in the application.

    • setCustomerCountryCombo

      public void setCustomerCountryCombo() throws SQLException
      Sets the available options for the "Country" ComboBox when updating a customer's information. This method initializes the "Country" ComboBox by populating it with a list of countries retrieved from the database. It also sets a prompt text for the ComboBox. When a country is selected, the lambda expression within the listener responds to the selection event by updating the available options in the "First-Level Division" ComboBox based on the selected country.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs during data retrieval.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the controller and sets up the initial state of the user interface.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object.
